name: Click For Cash: Cashed Out
summary:
it's time to click till you're filthy rich... again!

Welcome to Click For Cash: Cashed Out, the best idle clicker game about yellow buttons since the original Click For Cash! This sequel is filled to the brim with new features, customization, and polish. In this game you click a button for cash (real original, I know), purchase a variety of upgrades to get more money, and unlock achievements to become the richest person in the universe! at least in the game...
